mainText:
I knew that Steve was ill, but tonight's headlines still hit me as hard as
any death of any public figure has in my lifetime.

I got my first Mac in my teens -- the very first generation, with no
interior hard drive. I never looked back.

I have quit jobs because my employers refused to provide me with an Apple
computer. 

Steve Jobs has represented the best in innovative energy that this country
-- and world -- has to offer.

My deepest condolences to his family, his friends, his colleagues, and to
the world.

We are all much poorer today.
author: Leigh
